div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Mar. 4, 1906. JOHN F. LALLA & CO. (WHOLESALE GROCERY).

body.p: p. 1 - col. 6.. This big Bohemian wholesale grocery supplies all Bohemian grocers in Chicago. It is located at Halsted & Randolph Streets, in the heart of the Randolph Street markets. This concern handles all better brands of grocery items, domestic and imported. It is also the distributor of real rye flour which is widely used and preferred by the Bohemian people. Bohemians are noted for their real Bohemian rye bread.
John F. Lalla & Co. buys their rye flour from a Bohemian flour mill at Kewaunee, Wisconsin, known as W. Seyka and Co., which produces the best quality of rye flour.
